entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
